analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CryptoVideoGameItem.purchaseVideoGameItem (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#44-72):
	External calls:
	- parentOwner = parentContract.getVideoGameOwner(videoGameItems[_videoGameItemId].parentVideoGame) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#55-57)
	External calls sending eth:
	- videoGameItems[_videoGameItemId].ownerAddress.transfer(commissionOwner) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#59-61)
	- devFeeAddress.transfer(devFee) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#63)
	- parentOwner.transfer(parentOwnerFee) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#64)
	- newOwner.transfer(excess) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#66)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- videoGameItems (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#68)
	- videoGameItems (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#68-72)

CryptoVideoGameItem.contractCreator should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#5-6)
CryptoVideoGameItem.cryptoVideoGames should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#8-10)
CryptoVideoGameItem.devFeeAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#6-8)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_videoGameItemId' of CryptoVideoGameItem.purchaseVideoGameItem (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#45) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_newPrice' of CryptoVideoGameItem.modifyCurrentVideoGameItemPrice (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#77) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_videoGameItemId' of CryptoVideoGameItem.getVideoGameItemDetails (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_videoGameItemId' of CryptoVideoGameItem.getVideoGameItemCurrentPrice (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#99-100) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_videoGameItemId' of CryptoVideoGameItem.getVideoGameItemOwner (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2606c9bc5efe092a8925e7d6ae2f63a84c5fdea.sol#104-106) is not in mixedCase
